headline: 3 Nasdaq Stocks Down 20% or More That You'll Regret Not Buying on the Dip
summary: Here are three Nasdaq stocks down 20% or more that you'll regret not buying on the dip.  Shares of Google parent Alphabet (NASDAQ: GOOG) (NASDAQ: GOOGL) have dropped 23% below the all-time high set only a few weeks ago.  This decline could bring out all of the doomsayers who believe the company faces existential threats from generative AI and regulators.
